title: How to Bake Miniature Chocolate Chip Muffins

steps.headline: Spray miniature muffin pans with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the dry ingredients to a mixing bowl.
Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients.
Add the milk, vegetable oil, egg and vanilla to a separate mixing bowl.
Add the egg mixture to the center of the well in the dry ingredients.
Fold in the miniature chocolate chips.
Spoon batter into muffin cups filling each muffin cup to the top.
Bake 12 to 16 minutes or until a light golden brown.
steps.description: A wooden toothpick inserted in the center of the muffin will come out clean.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Spray miniature muffin pans with nonstick cooking spray.  Add the dry ingredients to a mixing bowl.  Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients.  Add the milk, vegetable oil, egg and vanilla to a separate mixing bowl. Whisk well. Add the egg mixture to the center of the well in the dry ingredients.  Mix gently to combine.  Fold in the miniature chocolate chips.  Spoon batter into muffin cups filling each muffin cup to the top.  Bake 12 to 16 minutes or until a light golden brown. A wooden toothpick inserted in the center of the muffin will come out clean. Finished.
